New Records: Virat Kohli scored the highest individual score of 76 runs in the match
India successfully defended a total of 176 runs to win the match
Key Match Events: Axar Patel and Virat Kohli formed a crucial 72-run partnership
Jasprit Bumrah and Arshdeep delivered a clinical bowling performance in the last overs
Suryakumar Yadav made a brilliant catch to dismiss David Miller in the final over
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized the team's consistent efforts over the years
India won the toss and decided to bat first
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli expressed relief and pride after the win
Rohit Sharma highlighted the importance of the win for India's cricket journey
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was India's second T20 World Cup title win after 17 years
The game was a high-scoring affair with both teams scoring heavily
